text: Burdett is an unincorporated community in Bates County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== Burdett was platted in 1870, and named after Samuel Swinfin Burdett, a state legislator. A post office called Burdett was established in 1870, and remained in operation until 1904. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Bates County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Burdett, Missouri
